name: Hymenaios
skill: Restores 1335/1635 HP to all allies and cures them of Poison.
ability: Moderately increases battle reward drop rate.

additional_data.description: A spirit of the Greek god of marriage ceremonies. Among his various ceremonial duties is singing a hymn as a blessing, and it's widely known among spirits that a ceremony lacking his dulcet tones will lead to a cursed marriage. No wonder he's never short of bookings.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 17/05/17- 07/06/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 04/06/17 - 07/06/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases battle time limit by 33% during the "Romance of the Demon and Sword" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 17/05/17- 07/06/17
